Content: A special security program has been implemented for the protection of devotees who would arrive at the Mihintala Sacred area for the Poson Full Moon Poya Day.Chief Monk of Mihintalawa Venerable Walawa-henguna-wewe Dhamma Rathana Thera requests the devotees to arrive at the Mihintala Sacred area for religious practices without any suspicion. Security authorities conducted a special search operation at the Mihintala Sacred Area and at the surrounding mountain range. It was conducted by the Sri Lanka Army, Special Task Force, Police and the Civil Defence Brigade.
